name: All Play and No Work
description:
#theweirderstuff #iwannacreate #clickteamfusion 

In this haunted house you play as a boy on a tricycle who must explore the halls of a haunted hotel in order to find 5 notes so that he may escape. Will you survive the ghost triplets? 

To play enter full screen and make sure you click the click button under the click team fusion  logo.

This game was created by Josh Duda and Trustin adkins in only 14 hours. 

Main music credit goes to our friend Meterstick Jim on Soundcloud who wrote this spooky toon in only a couple of hours.  https://soundcloud.com/meterstickjim/the-phantom-matron
